StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDistrictOSSs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@District int AS
SELECT OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID, OSS.SHORT_NAME, OSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION OSS INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP RS ON (OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID = RS.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'OSS' AND OSS.ISOPEN = 'Y') INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP DIST ON (RS.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = DIST.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND DIST.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @District) ORDER BY OSS.SHORT_NAME
